alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 7:07PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent and ongoing rains will cause rapid rises on the Green River. Paradise is expected to go into moderate flooding this weekend. This flooding is forecast to continue well into next week due to backwater on the Ohio. For the Green River...including Paradise...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 373.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 387.7 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
